reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Anderson is knowledgeable but her lectures can be a bit dry at times. Overall, a solid professor.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Absolutely fantastic professor! Always willing to help and makes difficult concepts easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Good professor but sometimes hard to follow. Make sure you attend the office hours.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: His lectures are engaging and he always ties history back to current events, which makes the material more interesting.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Very hard to follow. The exams are tough and not reflective of the lecture material.

reviews.subject: English
reviews.review: Dr. Harris provides excellent feedback on essays. However, her grading can be strict.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Interesting content but the class discussions can go off-topic at times.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: One of the best professors I've had. Her passion for the subject is contagious.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Engaging professor with lots of real-world examples. Exams can be tough but fair.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Decent professor, but sometimes the lectures feel rushed. Group work can be overwhelming.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Not very helpful during office hours and the lectures are not well-structured.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: An amazing professor with insightful lectures and thought-provoking assignments.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Clear and concise lectures. Very helpful during office hours.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Interesting lectures but can be difficult to stay engaged at times.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Not very approachable and doesn't seem to care about student success.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Engaging, knowledgeable, and always available for extra help.

reviews.subject: Business
reviews.review: Great professor, but the coursework can be overwhelming at times.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Her passion for the subject is evident in every lecture. Highly recommend her class!

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Decent lectures but not very interactive. Exams are fair.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Fascinating lectures with great real-life applications. However, the grading is a bit tough.
